title: Trump Rally Shooter Was A Maths Whiz At School, Had Won $500 Prize
content: The FBI identified 20-year-old Thomas Matthew Crooks of Bethel Park, Pennsylvania as the suspect in Saturday's attempted assassination of former US President Donald Trump at a campaign rally.
summary: The FBI identified 20-year-old Thomas Matthew Crooks of Bethel Park, Pennsylvania as the suspect in Saturday's attempted assassination of former US President Donald Trump at a campaign rally.

title: "Act Of God": Vivek Ramaswamy After Trump Survives Assassination Bid
content: Indian-American entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy today condemned the attack on former US President Donald Trump, who got hit on his ear during an attempt on his life at an election rally in Butler, Pennsylvania.
summary: Indian-American entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy today condemned the attack on former US President Donald Trump, who got hit on his ear during an attempt on his life at an election rally in Butler, Pennsylvania.

title: Trump Shooter Was Seen Moving From Roof To Roof, Claims Witness
content: Two witnesses at Donald Trump's election rally in Pennsylvania, where he was attacked, claimed to have seen the shooter, with one recalling how the gunman moved from roof to roof, apparently scouting for a perfect perch to shoot.
summary: Two witnesses at Donald Trump's election rally in Pennsylvania, where he was attacked, claimed to have seen the shooter, with one recalling how the gunman moved from roof to roof, apparently scouting for a perfect perch to shoot.

title: "Take Stock Of Policies Inciting Hatred": Russia To US After Trump Attack
content: Moscow called on the United States Sunday to "take stock" of its "policies of incitement to hatred", while using the assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump to denounce support for Ukraine.
summary: Moscow called on the United States Sunday to "take stock" of its "policies of incitement to hatred", while using the assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump to denounce support for Ukraine.

title: Heatwaves, Floods Disrupt Education, Increase Learning Loss: UNESCO Report
content: Climate related stressors like heat, wildfires, floods, droughts, diseases and rising sea levels affect education outcomes and threaten to undo educational gains of recent decade, according to the Global Education Monitoring Report (GEM).
summary: Climate related stressors like heat, wildfires, floods, droughts, diseases and rising sea levels affect education outcomes and threaten to undo educational gains of recent decade, according to the Global Education Monitoring Report (GEM).

title: Donald Trump's Security To Be Boosted After Shooting At Pennsylvania RallyD

title: "Horrific Moment": How US Media Reported Attack On Donald Trump

title: Purses Barred, 2-Hour Long Checks: Woman At Trump Rally Describes Security

title: On Donald Trump Rally Shooter's Motive, FBI Gives An Update
